ctoAsService.description: Hire the Rebel Force team as your strategic technology partner and gain access to elite tech leadership without the overhead.

leftContent.title: Your Elite Tech Command
leftContent.description: Not every mission requires a full-time CTO, but every business needs strategic technology leadership. Our CTO as a Service offering provides your business with experienced technology leadership and a specialized team at a fraction of the cost of hiring in-house.

items.title: Full Squad Access
items.description: Get an experienced CTO plus access to our entire specialized team of developers, designers, and security experts.

items.title: Accelerated Implementation
items.description: Skip the lengthy hiring process and get your technology initiatives moving at lightspeed with our ready-to-deploy team.

items.title: Strategic Advantage
items.description: Leverage our experience across multiple industries to gain insights and competitive advantages you wouldn't get from a single in-house CTO.

items.title: Flexible Engagement
items.description: Choose from monthly retainers, project-based work, or embedded team models to fit your specific needs and budget.

leftContent.itemsEnding: We find your lack of tech leadership disturbing

quote.text: Rebel Force has been our technology partner for over 2 years. Their team has transformed our operations and given us a competitive edge we couldn't have achieved on our own.

cta2.title: Ready to Transform Your Business?
cta2.description: Our expert team can help you implement cutting-edge technology solutions that drive real results.

team.description: Meet the rebels behind our success, a diverse team of experts dedicated to delivering excellence.

members.name: Abrar Anwar
members.title: CTO | Head of the Jedi Council
members.description: With over 12 years in the tech galaxy, Abrar leads the charge as Rebel Force’s resident Cloud Jedi. A specialist in architecture, he’s engineered scalable infrastructures that power systems for millions of users. From telco ecosystems to AI engines and fintech frameworks, his leadership in mission-critical deployments helps push the boundaries of digital innovation at lightspeed.

members.name: Emile Sawaya
members.title: CEO | Captain of the Ship
members.description: A serial entrepreneur and TechStars alumnus, Emile has piloted ventures through hyperspace across fintech and accessibility sectors for over 11 years. After selling his last startup to Barclays Bank, he set his sights on building the future of technology with Rebel Force. Equal parts visionary and strategist, Emile ensures the mission stays on course while navigating the ever-shifting tech landscape.

members.name: Nasif Azwad
members.title: Client Relations Manager | Gungan Galactic Senator
members.description: Nasif is the diplomatic core of Rebel Force. With an MBA and 7+ years of experience across business and tech interfaces, he excels in expectation management, communication strategy, and forging alliances. Whether brokering intergalactic deals or translating dev-speak into business goals, Nasif ensures our clients always feel heard, understood, and part of the rebellion.

members.name: Mehdi Hassan
members.title: Project Lead | Rebel Commander
members.description: Mehdi is our full-stack Force user — a seasoned warrior with 8+ years of battle-tested experience in mobile and backend development. Whether he's crafting seamless cross-platform apps, building solid Python-based backends, or polishing next-gen UI/UX, Mehdi leads tech teams like a true Rebel general, combining precision, agility, and creative firepower.
